item.description:
Learn about growing grapes in New England from one of the Somerville Farmer’s Market vendors, Dave Neilson of Coastal Vineyards. Additionally, backyard gardeners will share experiences growing hops in the city. Bring your stories and questions to the latest Urban Agriculture Skill-Building Workshop at the Somerville Community Growing Center!

Growing your own home brew ingredients adds a fun twist to urban agriculture and urban homesteading. We're hoping that experienced growers and those who want to get started will join us.

Did you know that Somerville Triple Deckers make great trellises for Hops?  Are you a renter that has inherited a grape arbor?  Are you interested in learning how to get started?  Hope you can join us and spread the word!

RSVP and learn more on the facebook event page: https://www.facebook.com/events/340580649367695/
item.name: Fruits of the Vine Workshop
